## üë®‚Äçüíª Full-Stack Developer

Hi, I‚Äôm a full-stack developer who thrives in building clean, scalable, and modern web applications. With a strong backend foundation and a flair for sleek frontends, I bring ideas to life with code.

### üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack

- **Backend**: Laravel, Node.js  
- **Frontend**: Vue.js, React, Next.js  
- **DevOps & Tools**: Docker, Git, CI/CD pipelines  
- **Databases**: PostgreSQL, MySQL  
- **Other Stuff**: REST APIs, authentication, third-party integrations, testing

### üìå Highlights

- Built and deployed full-scale applications using Laravel + Vue and Node + React/Next combos  
- Dockerized environments for smooth local dev and CI/CD  
- Integrated PostgreSQL and MySQL with optimized queries and DB design  
- Passionate about clean code, performance, and elegant UI/UX  
- Great team collaborator and async communicator
